籤詩版本二:
Ndakhala ndikukonzekera bizinesi kuyambira ndili mwana, kotero sindiyenera kupempha chuma ndi chuma.
Ngati anthu awiri akufunafuna chinachake, wophunzira amatuluka ndi kubwerera ndi mphoto yapamwamba.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi yakhala chizindikiro cha bizinesi kuyambira ali mwana.
Khalani akhama ndi osunga zinthu zonse komanso opanda nkhawa.
解曰: Kuyambira ali mwana mpaka kukula. Palibe cholepheretsa, palibe cholepheretsa. Pangani dongosolo. Kutchuka kumapita bwino.
籤詩故事一:
◇Cai Qing akubwezera kukoma mtima kwake (Cai Yong)
Cai Yong, dzina laulemu Bojie, adabadwira ku Chenliuyu (tsopano kumwera kwa Qixian County, Province la Henan). Iye ndi wophunzira komanso mwamuna wa Zhao Wuniang. Zaka zisanu zapitazo, khoti lachifumu lidalemba anthu aluso pamndandanda wachikasu, ndipo boma lidamulimbikitsa kuti abwere ku Beijing kudzalemba mayeso.
Chaka choyamba kuchokera pamene Cai Bojie anachoka zinali zosavuta kuthana nazo.
Chaka chotsatira, Chenliu anakumana ndi chilala choopsa, choncho adadalira Zhao Wuniangdian kuti agulitse zodzikongoletsera kuti apulumuke ndi njalayo.
Chilalacho chinatenga zaka zitatu panthawi imeneyi. Zhang Guangcai, mnansi wa m’mudzimo, ankamuthandiza nthawi ndi nthawi.
Pambuyo pake, Cai Bojie adapambana mphoto yoyamba ndipo adabwerera kunyumba kuti adziwe kuti mkazi wake adathandizidwa ndi Zhang Guangcai. Awiriwa adapita kunyumba ya Zhang kukathokoza ndipo adapatsa Zhang Guangcai matalente awiri asiliva ngati mphatso.
聖意: Pakhomo pamakhala mtendere, kudzikonda kukuyenda bwino, bizinesi ikuyenda bwino, banja likuyenda bwino, kubadwa kwa mwamuna kumakhala bwino, m'munda mwadzaza mphutsi za silika, ziweto zisanu ndi chimodzi zakhala bwino, kusaka kumayenda bwino, mlandu wapambana. , kusamuka kumayenda bwino, katundu wotayika ndi wabwino, matenda ndi phiri ndipo manda ndi abwino.
古人: Cai Qing amabwezera kukoma mtima kwake (Cai Yong)
第X籤: Chizindikiro makumi asanu ndi anayi mphambu ziwiri
